email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the adjusted rate looks better. However, could we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, can you confirm the vessel's availability for these dates? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve checked with the owner, and the vessel is available for the revised laycan of 18-23 October. Everything else remains the same: freight at $50.75 and demurrage at $15,000 per day. Shall we proceed with the fixture? Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, yes, let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your assistance. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. Summary: Vessel - Aframax 150,000 DWT, LOA 250m; Cargo - Crude Oil; Load Port - Houston; Discharge Port - Rotterdam; Laycan - 18-23 October; Freight - $50.75 per metric ton; Demurrage - $15,000 per day. Let me know if everything looks good. Best regards, Sarah
